pr_title: Add unit tests for predictions result transformers

timeline.message: Update rekognition result transformer unit test

timeline.bodyText:
The @VisibleForTesting thing isn't ideal, and is usually used for constructor overloads.
Why not just test fetchTable, and keep this is a private implementation detail of it? If fetchTable passes your test cases, you don't really care about what happens inside this cell-processing routine.
timeline.author: jamesonwilliams

replies.bodyText: I can do that! There was no real reason for me to do it besides breaking up test suites into smaller components
replies.author: raphkim

timeline.author: jamesonwilliams

replies.bodyText: the second solution seems nice! I'll do that
replies.author: raphkim
